content: 128 sts row 8 chain 3 double_crochet in next 43 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts 4 times double_crochet in next 11 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts 3 times 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 44 sts turn 136 sts fasten_off and weave in ends attach stick to blanket by slip stitching or sewing using mattress stitch see photos and tutorial below for more information share your blanket with #sugarrainbow on instagram please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern as long as you give design credit as sugar rainbow crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or etsy thank you for your support sugar rainbow crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful how to attach the popsicle stick to the rainbow 1 pin the center of the stick to the center of the rainbow lining up the starting chains pin each edge too 2 you can attach the stick to the rainbow by sewing them together or slip stitching them together whichever you prefer to sew insert a yarn needle from bottom of work up through stitch on one side then insert the needle from the bottom of the work up through the matching stitch on the other side repeat across the sewn seam looks the same from the front and back sugar rainbow crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful to slip_stitch the seam instead insert the hook through one stitch on the stick and one stitch on the rainbow yarn over and pull through both stitches repeat across the slip stitched seam looks different from the front and back front back sugar rainbow crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful
